name: Tanks Kill
description:
Play as an armored tank and kill other tank to survive :

- Move with arrow keys, target with mouse, shot with left click

- Click Play to play

- SPACE explode your tank
- ESC / ESCAP key quit the Game
- F1 In-game Help (in French)
- F2 back to the menu screen
- F3 music on/off
- F4 Fullscreen / Window
- F5 Quick Save
- F6 Quick Load
- F9 Screenshot

- After the last level the game loop and run faster
